thread.title: BRIEF-Yum Brands Says, Units Entered Into A Refinancing Amendment To Credit Agreement, Dated As Of June 16, 2016

title: BRIEF-Yum Brands Says, Units Entered Into A Refinancing Amendment To Credit Agreement, Dated As Of June 16, 2016
text:
Market News April 9, 2018 / 1:20 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Yum Brands Says, Units Entered Into A Refinancing Amendment To Credit Agreement, Dated As Of June 16, 2016 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 9 (Reuters) - Yum! Brands Inc: 
* YUM BRANDS SAYS ON APRIL 3, UNITS ENTERED INTO A REFINANCING AMENDMENT TO CREDIT AGREEMENT, DATED AS OF JUNE 16, 2016 - SEC FILING 
* AMENDMENT REPRICED EXISTING ABOUT$2.0 BILLION TERM LOAN B FACILITY; REDUCES INTEREST RATE APPLICABLE TO TERM B LOAN TO ADJUSTED LIBOR PLUS 1.75% 
* AMENDMENT EXTENDS MATURITY DATE FOR TERM B LOAN TO APRIL 3, 2025 Source text ( bit.ly/2HmlQZW ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
